name: SignalMountainBibleChurch
0:
”Alexa, open Signal Mountain Bible Church.”
”Alexa, ask Signal Mountain Bible Church, what is the scripture reading”
”Alexa, ask Signal Mountain Bible Church, what is the memorization verse”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: signal mountain bible church
des:
A skill that allows you to get the following information from the SMBC bulletin/website:
 - Scripture reading
 - Memorization verse
 - The songs we will be singing
 - A list of the sermons on the website

This skill also allows the user to play a sermon of choice from the website.
